title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Reinforcement Learning-Based H∞ Controller Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Experiment-centered intensive training to strengthen practical H∞ control design competencies

learning_goals: Explain the mathematical structure of GARE (Generalized Algebraic Riccati Equation) and the principles of H∞ control design.
Implement optimal control policies for linear discrete-time systems using reinforcement learning-based policy iteration algorithms.
Apply the Minimax Q-learning algorithm to a real-world system model satisfying persistent excitation (PE) conditions and interpret the results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
